results.title: Metformin attenuates depressive-like behaviour of methamphetamine withdrawal in mice: A mechanistic approach.
results.text_hl: Therefore, we aimed to investigate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ mitigate the @CHEMICAL_Methamphetamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008694 @@@methamphetamine@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Methamphetamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008694 @@@METH@@@) @<m>DISEASE_Substance_Withdrawal_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013375 @@@withdrawal syndrome@@@ in male @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Metformin modulates microbiota-derived inosine and ameliorates methamphetamine-induced anxiety and depression-like withdrawal symptoms in mice.
results.text_hl: Emerging studies suggest gut microbiota may impact @DISEASE_Mental_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@psychiatric symptoms@@@, but there is no direct evidence supporting @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s participation in the pathophysiology of @<m>DISEASE_Substance_Withdrawal_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013375 @@@withdrawal symptoms@@@ via modulation of gut microbiota.
